name: You Lose. Good Day, Sir. (final)
description:
You start with NOTHING.

Plus your Scrabble-solving mind.

And an angry armadillo.

How many words can you make? Will any of them be the right ones?

It is highly recommended that you play in full screen.

For the original game (accessible here) all writing, graphics, music, and sound effects were created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45: Start With Nothing. This final version includes bugfixes, additional hints, a scramble function, and a clear row function.
